parts.text: {"word":"arrancar","priority":"★★★","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"引き抜く、根こそぎにする、むしり取る","english_definition":"to pull out, to uproot, to tear out","examples":[{"sentence":"Arrancó la mala hierba del jardín.","translation":"彼は庭から雑草を引き抜いた。"},{"sentence":"El viento arrancó los árboles de raíz.","translation":"風が木を根こそぎにした。"},{"sentence":"Le arrancaron el collar de oro.","translation":"彼らは彼女から金のネックレスをむしり取った。"}],"collocations":["arrancar una planta (植物を引き抜く)","arrancar un diente (歯を抜く)","arrancar de raíz (根こそぎにする)"],"synonyms":["extraer","sacar","desarraigar"],"antonyms":["plantar","sembrar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"始める、開始する、着手する","english_definition":"to start, to begin, to set in motion","examples":[{"sentence":"Vamos a arrancar el proyecto la semana que viene.","translation":"来週プロジェクトを開始しよう。"},{"sentence":"Arrancó su carrera como escritor.","translation":"彼は作家としてのキャリアをスタートさせた。"},{"sentence":"Arrancaron las obras de construcción.","translation":"建設工事が始まった。"}],"collocations":["arrancar un negocio (ビジネスを始める)","arrancar un proyecto (プロジェクトを開始する)","arrancar una conversación (会話を始める)"],"synonyms":["empezar","iniciar","comenzar"],"antonyms":["terminar","finalizar","acabar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","intransitive","definition":"(乗り物が)動き出す、発車する、出発する","english_definition":"(of a vehicle) to start moving, to set off, to depart","examples":[{"sentence":"El tren arrancó puntualmente.","translation":"列車は時間通りに発車した。"},{"sentence":"El coche no arranca.","translation":"車がエンジンがかからない。"},{"sentence":"Arrancamos temprano por la mañana.","translation":"私たちは朝早く出発した。"}],"collocations":["arrancar el coche (車のエンジンをかける)","arrancar la moto (バイクのエンジンをかける)","arrancar el tren (列車が発車する)"],"synonyms":["ponerse en marcha","partir","salir"],"antonyms":["parar","detenerse"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","transitive","definition":"(感情・反応などを)引き起こす、誘発する、喚起する","english_definition":"to provoke, to elicit, to arouse (emotions, reactions)","examples":[{"sentence":"Su discurso arrancó aplausos del público.","translation":"彼の演説は聴衆から拍手喝采を浴びた。"},{"sentence":"La película me arrancó unas lágrimas.","translation":"その映画は私に涙を誘った。"},{"sentence":"Sus palabras arrancaron una sonrisa a la niña.","translation":"彼の言葉は少女に笑顔をもたらした。"}],"collocations":["arrancar una sonrisa (笑顔を引き出す)","arrancar lágrimas (涙を誘う)","arrancar aplausos (拍手を浴びる)"],"synonyms":["provocar","suscitar","despertar"],"antonyms":["calmar","apaciguar"]},{"part_of_speech":"verb","reflexive","definition":"(感情などが)こみ上げてくる、わき上がる","english_definition":"(of emotions) to well up, to surge","examples":[{"sentence":"Se le arrancaron las lágrimas al recordar a su madre.","translation":"母親を思い出すと、彼女の目に涙がこみ上げてきた。"},{"sentence":"Se me arrancó una rabia incontrolable.","translation":"抑えきれない怒りがこみ上げてきた。"}],"collocations":["arrancarse las lágrimas (涙がこみ上げてくる)","arrancarse la ira (怒りがこみ上げてくる)"],"synonyms":["brotar","surgir","emerger"],"antonyms":["contenerse","reprimirse"]}],"etymology":{"value":"恐らくはゴート語の *wrankjan (ねじる、曲げる) に由来し、ラテン語の eradicare (根絶する) と関連がある。","priority":"2"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/arranˈkaɾ/","syllables":"a-rran-car"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"present_simple":["arranco","arrancas","arranca","arrancamos","arrancáis","arrancan"],"past_simple":"arranqué","future_simple":"arrancaré","conditional_simple":"arrancaría","present_subjunctive":["arranque","arranques","arranque","arranquemos","arranquéis","arranquen"],"past_subjunctive":"arrancara","imperative":["arranca","arranque","arranquemos","arrancad","arranquen"]}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"Arrancarは非常に多様な意味を持つ動詞です。物理的な行為（引き抜く）から、抽象的な概念（始める、引き起こす）まで幅広く使われます。文脈によって意味が大きく変わるため、注意が必要です。","priority":"3"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"Yo arranco la casa.","correct":"Yo salgo de la casa.","note":"Arrancarは家を「引き抜く」という意味では使われません。出発する場合は、salirを使います。"},{"incorrect":"Arranco a comer.","correct":"Empiezo a comer.","note":"食事を始める場合は、empezarを使う方が自然です。"}],"priority":"2"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["arrancada (名詞: 急発進、スタート)","arranque (名詞: 開始、スタート、衝動)"],"phrasal_verbs":[]},"level_frequency":{"level":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"Relatively frequent"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"The verb 'arrancar' is versatile, meaning 'to pull out,' 'to start,' or 'to provoke.' Context is key to understanding its specific meaning. It's commonly used in everyday situations, such as starting a car or pulling weeds."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Tuve que arrancar el coche porque hacía mucho frío.","translation":"とても寒かったので、車を始動させなければならなかった。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"start (vehicle)"},{"sentence":"Arrancó la página del libro con rabia.","translation":"彼は怒って本からページを引き裂いた。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"tear out"},{"sentence":"El proyecto arrancará en enero.","translation":"プロジェクトは1月に開始されます。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"start (project)"}]}
